You will be asked the following 
questions during pregnancy 
and again after birth:
• Are you, your family or your 
baby’s father or his family 
from a country with high 
rates of TB?
• Are you likely to be living 
for more than a month, or 
travelling frequently, in a 
country with high rates of 
TB?
• Does anyone in your 
house, or anyone else who 
is likely to have long term 
contact with your baby, 
have TB, or have had it in 
the past, or come from one 
of these
